survey.title: Felder-Silverman Inventory
survey.subtitle: Discover your learning style
survey.mustComplete: You must complete the learning style questionnaire before accessing the courses.

results.pageSubtitle: Know your learning profile according to the Felder-Silverman model
results.dimension3: What medium do you prefer to receive information?
results.dimension4: How is content provided to you?
results.activeDesc: It is the learning style of people who tend to participate or get involved in experiences.
results.reflectiveDesc: It is the learning style of people with a tendency towards introspection and observation.
results.sensoryDesc: It is the learning style characteristic of those who prefer practical activities.
results.intuitiveDesc: It implies the discovery of new information by one's own means.
results.visualDesc: Information is obtained from images (photos, videos, diagrams, etc.).
results.verbalDesc: In this case, information is assimilated orally or in writing.
results.sequentialDesc: It is a learning style of those who need to link related data.
results.globalDesc: They can see information holistically, making it easier for them to integrate data to draw conclusions.

inicio.selectSurvey: Select a survey to see its description
